author: tcunning
msg: Retooled Gunnlaugur's class into a simple LDAP authenticator.    The simple
authenticator assumes that the publisher id is the same as the LDAP principal,
which probably will not be the case, but should be trivial for a user to
modify or for us to change later to support a number of options.

author: dwoods
msg: BVAL-70 Remove @Override annotations from methods implementing interfaces.  Original patch contributed by Matt Benson.

author: jbeard
msg: Did some work to get stuff owrking in Opera. Problem seems to be that non-string params were being set as parameters in the xslt processor. This now appears to be fixed, and the ad-hoc testing I have perfomred indicates that Opera is now working. I'm now trying to get Opera 10.54 to work with Selenium.

author: cezar
msg: Fix for Piccolo lexer when read method returns 0.
